name: Real Hang Gliding Free Game
description:
Real Hang Gliding is a challenging wing suit game for real adventure lovers. If you are good in flying love to wing suit fly so strong and brave to face the real environment you are going to love this game. Real Hang Gliding is very addictive game. Real Hang Gliding is constituent of perfectly tuned physics of great balancing 3D Gliding model.
Real Hang Gliding is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its challenging modes.
Feel the real experience of Gliding.
----- GAME FEATURES -----
Great Graphics, great controls, great levels and highly addictive game
Real Hang Gliding consists of 2 modes
Best graphics great sound and epic environment

----- GAME MODES -----
There are two modes of Real Hang Gliding.

--- VALLEY ---
In Valley mode of Real Hang Gliding Gilder have to pass through the blinking RED RINGS without touching the boundaries. Pass through all the rings to get maximum points and achieve the highest score. Control the glider as to pass all these rings as soon as you pass a ring it will get disappear and the next blinking ring will appear. Pass through all the rings and land your glider to designated landing point.

--- CITY ---
In City mode of Real Hang Gliding you need to control the glider to collect coins in great environment of city with skyscrapers. Mission is to collect the coins and to land the gilder securely on designated landing point to unlock the next target. In this mode you will also face the airy effect and you need to control the glider according the air pressure.
----- HOW TO PLAY -----
Tilt the screen
You need to tilt the screen to control the glider. Tilt left/right to move your glider left/right. If you tilt the screen upwards glider will start flying higher and if you tilt downwards glider will move/fly downwards.
Try to control your glider and manage to score maximum points.
